archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Workload Management System, WAMS
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Launched 2013 http://www1.uwe.ac.uk/aboutus/departmentsandservices/professionalservices/strategicprogrammesoffice/innovationandtransformation/workloadallocationmanagement.aspx
Generates TRAC reporting data
Came out of a project funded by the Leadership Foundation
In house system with Web interface. Platform?
Based on a unified UWE approach to workload allocation
